divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my wife were traveling along Route 1 in Princeton, NJ when we noticed what looked like a disk shaped object out of the side window over the town of Princeton. We went about about 15 miles with this disk shaped object following us on the left side of the road. Finally we were at our turn and the object continued straight and we could see it for some time out our back window. Finally it disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Princeton Township
This sighting has never been favorited.
